001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JarCommand;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.DeclaredModule;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.FolderType;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
011import java.nio.file.Path;
012
013/** Compiles and archives Java source files. */
014public class CompileWorkflow extends AbstractSpaceWorkflow {
015
016  public CompileWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
017    super(bach, project, space);
018  }
019
020  protected JavacCommand computeJavacCommand(Path classes) {
021    var computedModuleSourcePath = ModuleSourcePathComputer.compute(space);
022    return Command.javac()
023        .modules(space.modules().names())
024        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.patterns())
025        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.specifics())
026        .option(computeModulePathsOption())
027        .outputDirectoryForClasses(classes);
028  }
029
030  protected JarCommand computeJarCommand(DeclaredModule module, Path classes, Path modules) {
031    var name = module.name();
032    var version = project.version().value();
033    var file = modules.resolve(name + "@" + version + ".jar");
034
035    var jar = Command.jar().mode("--create").file(file);
036
037    if (module.mainClass().isPresent()) jar = jar.main(module.mainClass().get());
038
039    var folders = module.folders();
040    var baseSources = folders.list(0, FolderType.SOURCES);
041    if (!baseSources.isEmpty()) jar = jar.filesAdd(classes.resolve(name));
042    var baseResources = folders.list(0, FolderType.RESOURCES);
043    for (var resource : baseResources) jar = jar.filesAdd(resource);
044
045    //    if (computedModulePatches.mode() == PatchMode.CLASSES) {
046    //      var list = computedModulePatches.map().getOrDefault(name, List.of());
047    //      jar = jar.forEach(list, (call, path) -> call.with("-C", path, "."));
048    //    }
049
050    // multi-release
051    for (var release = 9; release <= Runtime.version().feature(); release++) {
052      if (!folders.list(release, FolderType.SOURCES).isEmpty()) {
053        jar = jar.filesAdd(release, computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(name, release));
054      }
055      for (var resource : folders.list(release, FolderType.RESOURCES)) {
056        jar = jar.filesAdd(release, resource);
057      }
058    }
059
060    return jar;
061  }
062
063  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses() {
064    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes-" + computeRelease());
065  }
066
067  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(String module, int release) {
068    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes-mr-" + release, module);
069  }
070
071  protected int computeRelease() {
072    return /*space.release().map(JavaRelease::feature).orElse*/ Runtime.version().feature();
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  public void run() {
077    var modules = space.modules().values();
078    if (modules.isEmpty()) {
079      bach.logMessage("No %s module present".formatted(space.name()));
080      return;
081    }
082    var size = modules.size();
083    bach.logCaption("Compile %d %s module%s".formatted(size, space.name(), size == 1 ? "" : "s"));
084
085    var classesDirectory = computeOutputDirectoryForClasses();
086    var modulesDirectory = computeOutputDirectoryForModules(space);
087    bach.run(computeJavacCommand(classesDirectory));
088    // TODO Compile sources targeted to Java 8
089    // TODO Compile sources targeted to Java 9+
090    bach.run(Command.of("directories", "clean", modulesDirectory));
091    modules.stream()
092        .parallel()
093        .map(module -> computeJarCommand(module, classesDirectory, modulesDirectory))
094        .forEach(bach::run);
095  }
096}
